alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 10:40PM CDT until April 04 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Rockwall County in north central Texas... Northeastern Dallas County in north central Texas... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1039 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over University Park, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Dallas, Garland, Irving, Mesquite, Carrollton, Richardson, Rowlett, Wylie, Rockwall, Farmers Branch, Balch Springs, University Park, Sachse, Addison, Highland Park, Hutchins, Heath, Fate, Sunnyvale and Wilmer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
